item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "A good story is a good story no matter who wrote it." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Who wills, Can. Who tries, Does. Who loves, Lives." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Dalai Lama
item.description: "Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them." -- Dalai Lama

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Lora Leigh
item.description: "You don't change what you love or you never loved it to begin with." -- Lora Leigh

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Some humans would do anything to see if it was possible to do it. If you put a large switch in some cave somewhere, with a sign on it saying 'End-of-the-World Switch. PLEASE DO NOT TOUCH', the paint wouldn't even have time to dry." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It's not worth doing something unless someone, somewhere, would much rather you weren't doing it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "If you have enough book space, I don't want to talk to you." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Real stupidity beats artificial intelligence every time." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The gods of the Disc have never bothered much about judging the souls of the dead, and so people only go to hell if that's where they believe, in their deepest heart, that they deserve to go. Which they won't do if they don't know about it. This explains why it is so important to shoot missionaries on sight." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "To save the world takes one cold son of a bitch." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Even if it's not your fault, it's your responsibility." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: shartyrant add a quote by James R. Tuck
item.description: "And vampires never sparkle unless they just ate a stripper." -- James R. Tuck
